Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class ShipPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • topMargin

          int topMargin
          Height of the blank space above the board panel in pixel. It is 10 by default.

        • leftMargin

          int leftMargin
          Width of the blank space left of the board panel in pixel. It is 10 by default.

        • placeSize

          int placeSize
          Number of pixels between horizontal/vertical lines of the board panel to present places. By default, it is 30.

        • shipSize

          int shipSize
          Number of rows/columns of the battleship board. The board will have boardSize x boardSize places.

        • boardColor

          java.awt.Color boardColor
          Background color of the board. It's blue by default.

        • hitColor

          java.awt.Color hitColor
          Color for drawing places that are hit and have a ship.

        • missColor

          java.awt.Color missColor
          Color for drawing places that are hit but have no ship.

        • lineColor

          java.awt.Color lineColor
          Foreground color for drawing 2-d grid lines for board and places.

        • board

          Board board
          Battleship board to be displayed by this panel.

        • shipName

          java.lang.String shipName

        • hits

          int hits

  • Package battleship

    • Class battleship.BattleshipDialog extends javax.swing.JDialog implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • playButton

          javax.swing.JButton playButton
          To start a new game.

        • msgBar

          javax.swing.JLabel msgBar
          Message bar to display the number of shots and the outcome.

        • board

          Board board
          Battleship game model.

    • Class battleship.BoardPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • topMargin

          int topMargin
          Height of the blank space above the board panel in pixel. It is 10 by default.

        • leftMargin

          int leftMargin
          Width of the blank space left of the board panel in pixel. It is 10 by default.

        • placeSize

          int placeSize
          Number of pixels between horizontal/vertical lines of the board panel to present places. By default, it is 30.

        • boardSize

          int boardSize
          Number of rows/columns of the battleship board. The board will have boardSize x boardSize places.

        • boardColor

          java.awt.Color boardColor
          Background color of the board. It's blue by default.

          java.awt.Color hitColor
          Color for drawing places that are hit and have a ship.

        • missColor

          java.awt.Color missColor
          Color for drawing places that are hit but have no ship.
